        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    var startDate = new GlideDateTime();
    if(JSUtil.nil(current.getValue("start_date"))) {
        PPMDebug.log("Program Task -> Start Date is EMPTY");
        if(JSUtil.notNil(current.getValue('parent'))) {
            var program = current.parent.getRefRecord(); 
            var programStartDate = new GlideDateTime(program.getValue("start_date"));
            if(startDate.compareTo(programStartDate) < 0) {
                startDate = programStartDate;
            }
        }
        current.start_date = startDate.getValue();
    } else {
        startDate = new GlideDateTime(current.getValue("start_date"));
    }
    var duration = new GlideDuration();
    duration.setValue("1970-01-02 00:00:00");
    if(JSUtil.nil(current.getValue("duration"))) {
        current.duration = duration;
    } else {
        duration.setValue(current.getValue("duration"));
    }
    var endDate = (new ProgramDatesUtil()).getEndDate(startDate, duration);
    current.setValue('end_date', endDate);
  
})(current, previous);]]></script>
